positive_examples: This is an example of siege warfare.
The siege warfare demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed siege warfare in this context.
A typical case of siege warfare would involve these features.
The concept of siege warfare applies here.
A military assault involving the surrounding and blockading of a fortified position to force surrender.
negative_examples: This is an example of direct assault, not siege warfare.
This represents military assault in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DirectAssault, or other types of MilitaryAssault

definition: Military operations involving surrounding and attacking a fortified position.
